verbs.description: The news that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: authorized] [ARG2: the U.S. military] [ARG1: to strike a Syrian chemical manufacturing facility] is hardly surprising . Even without the potential incentive to distract the news media from Robert Mueller ’s investigation and the next phase of James Comey ’s “ Buy My Book ! ” tour , almost any president would want to strike at Bashar al - Assad after his repeated
